PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2022-08172022-06-24ISI,  IT, EP, SB & ED,  FIN,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Small Business Financing Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Canada Small Business Financing Regulations
PrecisRegulations Amending the CANADA SMALL BUSINESS FINANCING REGULATIONS in order to (1) establish parameters for a new line of credit financing product; (2) expand the loan classes; (3) increase the maximum loan amount and coverage period for equipment and leasehold improvements; (4) establish maximum amounts for loan products and loan classes; and (5) make other minor technical, consequential and administrative changes.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2022-0157 Publication Date: 2022-07-06
AttachmentsAttachment
